title: Space-scale diagrams: understanding multiscale interfaces
proctitle: CHI '95: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Benjamin B. Bederson
authors.institution: Computer Science Department, University of New Mexico, Albuquerque, NM and Bellcore, 445 South Street, Morristown, NJ
